text: "In the Middle of the Night" is a 1994 song recorded by the German eurodance band Magic Affair. It was released as the third single from their debut studio album, Omen (The Story Continues...). Rap parts are performed by American rapper AK Swift, and lead vocals by German singer Franca Morgano. The song was a moderate success in Europe, peaking at number 10 in Finland, number 14 in Austria and number 16 in Germany and Sweden. On the Eurochart Hot 100, the single reached number 34 in September 1994. ==Music video== The music video for "In the Middle of the Night" was directed by Manuela Hiller & Oliver Sommer. ==Track listing== ==Charts and certifications== ===Weekly charts=== {|class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- !scope="col"|Chart (1994) !scope="col"|Peak position |- |- !scope="row"|Europe (Eurochart Hot 100) |34 |- !scope="row"|Finland (Suomen virallinen lista) |10 |- !scope="row"|France (SNEP) |26 |- !scope="row"|Germany (Media Control Charts) |16 |- |- |- !scope="row"|Scotland (Official Charts Company |34 |- |- !scope="row"|UK Singles (Official Charts Company) |38 |- |} ===Year-end charts=== {|class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- !scope="col"|Chart (1994) !scope="col"|Position |- !scope="row"|Netherlands (Dutch Top 40) |177 |- !scope="row"|Sweden (Sverigetopplistan) |89 |- |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1994 singles Category:1994 songs Category:Magic Affair songs Category:EMI Records singles Category:Music videos directed by Oliver Sommer
